title: Lei ah muan ding omlou.
Toupa lou in.
Nun aam ni.

hou lung kumkhawm in
lungtuak leng diamdiam leng
Ei a din manpha...
Simlei in tangtawn daihlou 
Sianmang liim beel ni

mimbang i piang lou
lungtuak leng diamdiam ni
damlai hun leh ni
Tuibang kiam mualliam zel
lenlai i nun nuam
Sian Siam a tangbang i damlai ni

title: Damlai hinkhua.
lyrics:
Dam lai hinkhua suk leh tou ka pal hun chiang in
Nuam leh kipak a om det ding lunggulh man
Khemna haksa pel din Pa kana nget zel hang'
Ka Toupa aw nang thu hi hen chithei kei veng aw!
Ka maituah ding a na phal ah Toupa aw hon pii in  
Liam leh bai ngal liam zong na dung sun nuam veng
Nunkhua nuam a nang kon gamlat sang in
Haksatna tampi toh Toupa naih kei din a hoih hi
Toupa naih kei din  hoih pen hi
Ka ma ah khemna om chi'n lau zel veng Toupa
Maituah ngamlou lam tuam tai siat nang zong ing  
Toupa gal hat thil hihtheihna phok banlou in
Dawilok hinatel ing e Pa hon ngaidam in aw
Ka maituah ding a na phal ah Toupa aw hon pii in  
Liam leh bai ngal liam zong na dung sun nuam veng
Nunkhua nuam a nang kon gamlat sang in
Haksatna tampi toh Toupa naih kei din a hoih hi
Toupa naih kei din  hoih pen hi
Khelh vang thuak na hi zong Pa hehpihna'n hon pi
Niteng Khros pua tuanglam sau ah bah zong leng
Toupan a itna aw nem toh hon huau zel a
Ka hatlouhna Amin laamsangtu hon suak sak ta
Ka maituah ding a na phal ah Toupa aw hon pii in  
Liam leh bai ngal liam zong na dung sun nuam veng
Nunkhua nuam a nang kon gamlat sang in
Haksatna tampi toh Toupa naih kei din a hoih hi
Toupa naih kei din  hoih pen hi
Unau setan khemna nisim na dou zel maw?
Douna hat zong vualzou gingtu hi ding in
Sian simthu pha ma suan nisim melma dou le
Zohna puanlap tawi sang zaila thak i lem ngei ding
Ka maituah ding a na phal ah Toupa aw hon pii in  
Liam leh bai ngal liam zong na dung sun nuam veng
Nunkhua nuam a nang kon gamlat sang in
Haksatna tampi toh Toupa naih kei din a hoih hi
Toupa naih kei din  hoih pen hi

title: Van hauhna.
lyrics:
Lei ah gou manpha nei lou in
Lei hauhna ka nei lou zong
Van ah gou manpha ka neih man in
Aw tua hi ka lung nopna
Van hauhna gou manpha  nei ing
Leikha leh tui ek te in a nek phaklouh
A vul theilou a mang thei lou
Van hauhna ka nei ta hi.
Ka gou omna vantung gam hi
Lei goute a mangthang ding
Ken zaw van hauhna ka delh zel a
Tunglam ah ka buai zaw hi
Van hauhna gou manpha  nei ing
Leikha leh tui ek te in a nek phaklouh
A vul theilou a mang thei lou
Van hauhna ka nei ta hi.
Laukha maimit in gal don leng
Van hauhna thupi na e
Simlei a tang bang ka dam sung in
Van ah gou  ka khol zel ding
Van hauhna gou manpha  nei ing
Leikha leh tui ek te in a nek phaklouh
A vul theilou a mang thei lou
Van hauhna ka nei ta hi.
Phat chim kei ning awi chim kei ning
Van gam nuam ka tun chiang in
Ka gou manpha Toupa mel mu in
Tawplou in ka phat ding hi
Van hauhna gou manpha  nei ing
Leikha leh tui ek te in a nek phaklouh
A vul theilou a mang thei lou
Van hauhna ka nei ta hi.

title: Hong phat ung Toupa.
lyrics:
It leh ngaih tampi lenmual khum nung in
Tuni dong mel in muthei lai ung
Kou hoih vang hilou kou siam vang hilou
Toupa aw nang hoih na vang hi zaw 
Hong phat ung Toupa
Laambang hong pak ung
Kabitna uh  leh ka innsang uh
Hong kem Hong huai pa,
Lam bang hong pipa
Na hoihna kou din a thupi lua.
Liamsa nun luite  gel kik kik le ung
Nongpina lam dang mu semsem ung
Tang a Israelte na pi bang in
Koute hong pipa nang mah na hi.
Hong phat ung Toupa
Laambang hong pak ung
Kabitna uh  leh ka innsang uh
Hong kem Hong huai pa,
Lam bang hong pipa
Na hoihna kou din a thupi lua.
An leh tui hong muam hong khanglian sakpa
Kua hi lou nang mah na hi Toupa
Kal khat khit kal khat nong suanpih lai maw
Nun nuam in na min hong phat ung e
Hong phat ung Toupa
Laambang hong pak ung
Kabitna uh  leh ka innsang uh
Hong kem Hong huai pa,
Lam bang hong pipa
Na hoihna kou din a thupi lua.
Na gelna pian in dang sa'ng e Toupa
Kou din hoih lua hi na zing vaihawm
Na tate leem naang bang nong diah duai a
Tuni dong nang di'n  kip lai ung e.
Hong phat ung Toupa
Laambang hong pak ung
Kabitna uh  leh ka innsang uh
Hong kem Hong huai pa,
Lam bang hong pipa
Na hoihna kou din a thupi lua.

title: Vui thei ka hilou.
lyrics:
Lungkhamna leh mangbatna’n hon bawm chiang’
Taksap luat vangin vui kha nak ing e;
Khovel thupina hauhna ka neilou zong,
Vuithei ka hilou, vui na ding ka neilou hi.
Vuithei ka hilou Toupa aw na tungah,
Na hehpihna kei di’n hun hi;
Na ta ka hihman in thunun zong ka loh ding,
Bangteng hontung zong vuithei ka hilou.
Ka Khualzinna lampi suk leh tou ah,
Bah a kapuk chiang’ vui kha nak ing e;
Khualzinna gam zaw khawlna gam a hilou,
Van inn ka tunchiang’ nunnuam in tutkhawl ta ning.
Vuithei ka hilou Toupa aw na tungah,
Na hehpihna kei di’n hun hi;
Na ta ka hihman in thunun zong ka loh ding,
Bangteng hontung zong vuithei ka hilou.
Nopna, Dahna nisim ka machiang ah,
Vualzawlna lel en nungzui ka hilou;
Haksatna vang a heisan thei ka hilou,
Thilhoih zong ngah ing, a sia zong hong tung ding hi.
Vuithei ka hilou Toupa aw na tungah,
Na hehpihna kei di’n hun hi;
Na ta ka hihman in thunun zong ka loh ding,
Bangteng hontung zong vuithei ka hilou.
Sim ka siamlou vualzawlna ka don te,
Thuakdan ka siamlou lungkham mangbatna;
Gimthuak, haksatna hi a ka ngaihsut te,
Hamsia ahilou vualzawlna ahong tang zel.
Vuithei ka hilou Toupa aw na tungah,
Na hehpihna kei di’n hun hi;
Na ta ka hihman in thunun zong ka loh ding,
Bangteng hontung zong vuithei ka hilou.

title: Hinna tui a luang hi.
Tua huan sung.
lyrics:
Tua huan sung’ kei vuak kong pai lai’,
Paksil ah jing daikia vung nalai;
Tua mun ah aw khat ken ka bil-in ja’ng,
Pathian’ Tapa’n a genkhiak.
Aman kei hontonpih, honhoupih a,
Amah’a hi’ng chih honhilh hi;
Tua muna lungdamna ka neihkhawm uh,
Kuadang in thei kha ngeilou.
Thu hon gen, A aw nem mahmah,
Vasa zong ham dai-in dai khipkhep;
A aw ging kilawm kei hong jaksak pen,
Ka lungsung ah thamden hi.
Aman kei hontonpih, honhoupih a,
Amah’a hi’ng chih honhilh hi;
Tua muna lungdamna ka neihkhawm uh,
Kuadang in thei kha ngeilou.
Huan sung’ A kiang omden nuam ing,
Ka kim ka pam khua hongmial zong-in;
Hihhang Aman kei pai ding’ honsawl hi,
Tua nung A aw zaden ing.
Aman kei hontonpih, honhoupih a,
Amah’a hi’ng chih honhilh hi;
Tua muna lungdamna ka neihkhawm uh,
Kuadang in thei kha ngeilou.

title: Zohna toh hong ompih in.
Moh maina.
Pak palh zu bang.
lyrics:
Pakpalh zu bang ka khumlou zong,
Khuai bang in ka paal hong veh in;
Ka nunna thelnah bang keu zong leh,
Toupa aw hong paampaih kei in.
Aw ka nunna tualniam zong leh,
Toupa nang ding in hon zang in;
Etlawm pak bang ka hihlou hang’n,
Ka nunna nang di’n zang in aw.
Lengthe bang zai ka siamlou zong’n,
Ka sak zailate hong ngai aw;
Pilna siamna ka neihlouh hang in,
Ka nunna sennau bang pom in.
Aw ka nunna tualniam zong leh,
Toupa nang ding in hon zang in;
Etlawm pak bang ka hihlou hang’n,
Ka nunna nang di’n zang in aw.
Tantawk ah hong lungkim pih in,
Toupa nang di’n ki zang nuam ing;
Septheih bang ka sep ding hon nial ken,
Nang di’n liimsing bang hi nuam ing.
Aw ka nunna tualniam zong leh,
Toupa nang ding in hon zang in;
Etlawm pak bang ka hihlou hang’n,
Ka nunna nang di’n zang in aw.

title: Na thupi lua.
lyrics:
Toupa aw na siamna a thuk lua e,
Na thupi nate sut zoh ding hilou;
Na pilna a thuk aw Na siamna sang,
Mihing pilna in a sut zoh ding hilou.
Thupinate Pahtawinate,
A tawntung Nang ahi;
Pilna siamna sanna khempeuh Toupa nang a hi,
Na thupi lua na min ka hong phat uh.
Bangkim Nang a hi vaihawmpa na hi,
Tung si-alte leh vandum khen lam ah;
A lamdang penpen a thupi penpen,
Piandang lawmlawm e Toupa na thupina.
Thupinate Pahtawinate,
A tawntung Nang ahi;
Pilna siamna sanna khempeuh Toupa nang a hi,
Na thupi lua na min ka hong phat uh.
Pahtawinate leh vangletna khempeuh,
Beini neilou ding aw na thupina;
Tawntung in Nang a phat ding in kilawm,
Minthanna khempeuh Nang a di’n hong pia ung.
Thupinate Pahtawinate,
A tawntung Nang ahi;
Pilna siamna sanna khempeuh Toupa nang a hi,
Na thupi lua na min ka hong phat uh.

title: Jesu deihpen ing.
Hong sang in.
lyrics:
Toupa ka hong kipia Nang a ding in,
Na khut sung ah ka om hon zang in aw;
Ka siamna omlou zong ka pilna omlou zong,
Ka nunna tualniam zong hong sang in aw.
Hong sang in ka nunna Toupa aw,
Na min thupina di’n hon zang in;
Ka hihna bangbang in nang in hon pom inla,
Na deihna mun peuh ah hon zang in aw.
Ki manna ding omlou ka hizong in,
Hoih ding na chihna peuh ah hong koih in;
Bellei a seekpa in a deihbang a bawl bang,
Kei zong hong bawl in aw na deih bang in.
Hong sang in ka nunna Toupa aw,
Na min thupina di’n hon zang in;
Ka hihna bangbang in nang in hon pom inla,
Na deihna mun peuh ah hon zang in aw.
Mihing in a et bang hon enlou aw,
Mihing in a telbang hon tellou aw;
Nang in a hatloute nangawn na tel zaw a,
A hatlou keimah zong hong sang in aw.
Hong sang in ka nunna Toupa aw,
Na min thupina di’n hon zang in;
Ka hihna bangbang in nang in hon pom inla,
Na deihna mun peuh ah hon zang in aw.

title: Ka hakkol pua un.
lyrics:
Aw ka lei nunna, Lungjinna lel hi,
Hambang ka vaihna simlei ah;
Ka puakgik lel in bah in ka thum lai’,
Tawldamna kon pia ding Toupa’n hong chi.
Leitung pilna leh Thupina te in,
Na puakgik hon dawn zou ding hiam?
“Ka kiang’ hong pai in khawlna kon pia ding”,
Hauhna sum leh pai vang’ nopna hilou.
Ka Hakkol pua un, Kei a pan sin un,
Nou semgim leh puakgik pua te aw;
Ka kiang hong pai un, khawlna kon pia ding,
Ka Hakkol jang in, puak a nuam hi.
Nelhsiah a om a, deihhuai na’ng neilou,
It tu ding neilou mite aw;
“Ka itna sung ah itna kiching hi”,
Ka Hondampa awnem ngaih hi na e!
Ka Hakkol pua un, Kei a pan sin un,
Nou semgim leh puakgik pua te aw;
Ka kiang hong pai un, khawlna kon pia ding,
Ka Hakkol jang in, puak a nuam hi.
Theihna tamsem sem, hauhna khangsem sem,
Lungkham, buaina zong pungsem sem;
Lailungmuan omlou hiai nuai simlei ah,
Khamuang in tawldam ning ka Pa ang ah.
Ka Hakkol pua un, Kei a pan sin un,
Nou semgim leh puakgik pua te aw;
Ka kiang hong pai un, khawlna kon pia ding,
Ka Hakkol jang in, puak a nuam hi.

title: Honpi zel in.
lyrics:
Tuanglam sau leh mial nuai ah,
Mangbang a ka tutlai in;
Kei honglen in (Kei hong len in)
Toupa hoih aw (Toupa hoih aw)
Hinna siang hon neisak in;
Phatna lungtang hon guan in,
Honpi zelin (Honpi zelin)
Nisim in ah (Nisim in ah)

Hong makaih in (Hong makaih in)
Nisim in ah (Nisim in ah) 
Tuanglam siangthou (Tuanglam siangthou)
zuih kanuam hi (zuih ka nuam hi)
Khovel lawmte’n (khovel lawmte’n)
hong pampaih zong (hong pampaih zong)
Kon ngen uhi (kon ngen uhi) Honpi zelin aw.

Ginlah buaina gamah zaw,
Paklun laite tul zel hi;
Kei hong len in (Kei honglen in)
Toupa hoih aw (Toupa hoih aw)
Nang na hi ka muanna pen Van innnuam ka tung dongin;
Honpi zelin (Honpi zelin)
Nisim in ah (Nisim in ah)

Hong makaih in (Hong makaih in)
Nisim in ah (Nisim in ah) 
Tuanglam siangthou (Tuanglam siangthou)
zuih kanuam hi (zuih ka nuam hi)
Khovel lawmte’n (khovel lawmte’n)
hong pampaih zong (hong pampaih zong)
Kon ngen uhi (kon ngen uhi) Honpi zelin aw.

Vanglaini te hong tul in,
Ka hatna te kiam zong leh;
Kei hong len in (Kei hong len in)
Toupa hoih aw (Toupa hoih aw)
Nutsiat in om ngei keining;
Van mun nuam katung ngei ding;
Honpi zelin (Honpi zelin)
Nisim in ah (Nisim in ah)

Hong makaih in (Hong makaih in)
Nisim in ah (Nisim in ah) 
Tuanglam siangthou (Tuanglam siangthou)
zuih kanuam hi (zuih ka nuam hi)
Khovel lawmte’n (khovel lawmte’n)
hong pampaih zong (hong pampaih zong)
Kon ngen uhi (kon ngen uhi) Honpi zelin aw.
